Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class responsible for representing a block in-game. Blocks are built on a 2 dimensional array of [rows][columns], depending on BlockType.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Dias (190221068) e Tomás Barroso (190221029)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
